Name: Old Man McLudum
Text: *COUGH* Look, lad. I've gotta get to an appointment. *COUGH*

Name: Old Man McLudum
Text: Yes, yes *COUGH*, good enough. I've only got one customer today, but...

Name: Old Man McLudum
Text: It's not an easy trip... you'll have to cut through the construction yard.

Name: You
Text: Yeah... hey... let me know if I can help? Y'know... get you some medicine maybe?

Name: Old Man McLudum
Text: *COUGH* Thanks boy. I'll be all right...
